dataList.content: In regards to every activity, involvement of unnecessary emotions and personal judgment is to be wasteful.
Hm... I'm gonna need you to elaborate on that.
Then I will share an excerpt from Sinclair's exchange with the manager, thirty-two days ago. Begin quote:
Huh? Thirty-two days ago? What—
"Uhm, uh... excuse me, Dante... I'm sorry to have to um, ask you this, but... most of us are fatally wounded, so... can you please turn the clock just one more time?"
End quote.
Unnecessary interjections weighed down your request.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... Wow, that's pretty bad.
Uh, did... did I really stutter that badly?
It is a waste of time to involve emotions when delivering unfavorable news.
The same message could have been delivered with merely two words:
"We failed."
Let us commence field practice.
Do not ask me a single question for the next five minutes.
Huh...? Well, okay. Sure, seems easy enough...
Gnnuugh...!
Suddenly, Meursault let out a cry as he clutched his chest, then fell to the floor.
A-are you okay?!
<Meursault, you okay?>
His eyes snapped open.
Task failed. Five minutes have not passed.
... You're cheating...
This reminds me.
Of the incident Sinclair had so desperately wished to hide.
... What?! The what who wished to what?!
Despite your belief that no one would ever find out your secret, there was one person who got to the bottom of the incident.
Come on, just what did you see—!?
Failed again.
